meanings: a disaster, a misfortune, a mishap, a calamity
get angry[enraged, indignant, infuriated], get mad[upset]

examples.korean: She shot an angry glance at him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 휙 화난 눈길을 그에게 던졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: ‘Leave me alone!’ she hissed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “날 혼자 내버려 둬!” 그녀가 화난 소리로 낮게 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Leave me alone!’ she hissed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His angry glance said it all. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 화난 눈빛이 그 모든 것을 표현하고[말하고] 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His angry glance said it all. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His calm response dissolved her anger. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 차분한 반응에 그녀의 화난 마음이 사라졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
